tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_citations (
    citation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    case_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    court_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    case_date DATE NOT NULL,
    judge_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE legal_citations (
  citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_citation VARCHAR(255),
  court_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_published DATE
);

CREATE TABLE attorneys (
  attorney_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  specialization VARCHAR(100),
  law_firm VARCHAR(255),
  years_practicing INT
);

CREATE TABLE legal_citations (
 case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 case_citation TEXT NOT NULL,
 case_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 court_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 case_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE LegalCases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  court_name VARCHAR(255),
  judge_name VARCHAR(255),
  citation TEXT
);
